name: Royal Guard
summary: Welcome to the elven kingdom and help the archers protect the kingdom. The arcade represents the type of free online defense games, when there is no particular spot like tower or castle to defend. Instead you have to shoot up enemy waves in order not to let them reach the edge of the battlefield. Being one of archery games online with fantasy setting, it provides classic arcade gameplay and features good length. Free online games for boys often have achievements to unlock, and this defence game also offers badges. So, shoot zombies and liches, rats and goblins and become the pride of the elven guard.
